ygData.subject: RE: Another take on twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there a special cloak for monks only, my friend was telling me about it yesterday. He said it was a blood something I think, anybody heard about this? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Is there a special cloak for monks only, my friend was telling me about it
yesterday. He said it was a blood something I think, anybody heard about
this?

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Bleich [mailto:dolph@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 8:09 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking


From: "Jeff Bleich" <dolph@...>

When you think about it Journey men boots are no DROp...it would be close to
imposible to get them at level 6.......meaning he must of had 5 level 50 's
walk with him down thier and they let him loot it
----- Original Message -----
From: <Felizpunk@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 9:38 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Another take on twinking


> From: Felizpunk@...
>
> In a message dated 9/15/99 4:31:16 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> ryugen47@... writes:
>
> << Hehe, full bronze isn't serious twinking. That's someone who wanted to
> try
> a tank, but didn't want to go through the pain of buying/wearing
pw/leather.
> Serious twinking is the guy I saw the other day in full steel plate
(yes,
> every single piece of it) who con'd green to my 22 Ranger. >>
>
> My own favorite example was a lvl 6, with full steel plate, an exec axe,
a
> black silk sash, and journeyman boots! LOL
>
